svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:51.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/51.0" version="6.2.1" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 296px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Study different microstructural descriptors. Learn the information contained in each of
them.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 216px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Study methods to reconstruct
random structures based on
specific microstructural
descriptors

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 296px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Generate structures using the chosen reconstruction method

switch.text: Generate structures using the chosen reconstruction method

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 296px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Determine and compare the
effective flow properties of the reconstructed structure with
the original structure

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 231px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Have a base collection of test structures/binary images

switch.text: Have a base collection of test structures/binary images

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 231px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Apply and record the application of these descriptors on the collection

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 231px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Identify the features captured by each of the descriptors

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
